content: कोलः [कुल् संस्त्याने अच्] {@--1@} A hog, boar; <ls>Śi. 14. 43</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 14.">86.</ls> {@--2@} A raft, boat. {@--3@} The breast. {@--4@} The haunch, hip, lap. {@--5@} An embrace. {@--6@} The planet Saturn. {@--7@} An out-cast, one of a degraded tribe. {@--8@} A barbarian. --लं {@--1@} The weight of one Tola. {@--2@} Black pepper. {@--3@} A kind of berry.
